Stowe pinnacle with a delicate babe

Three weeks after our second was born, we took him on his first hike

  • Written: Oct 10, 2019
  • Date hiked: Oct 10, 2019
  • Peak: Stowe pinnacle (2,650 feet)
  • Distance: 3.2 miles
  • Town: Stowe
  • State: Vermont

His older sister started preschool, but my wife and I were still off work, so us and my parents took to the mountain.

This summit is famous for its two Golden Retrievers, Sampson and Baylor, who were known to hike the trail alone, acting as unofficial guides for hikers. PBS even hosts a 15 minute doc about them.

Baylor passed away in November 2020 at the age of 12, a year after this photo was taken.

According to reddit, Sampson doesn’t partake these days. I felt lucky to witness this canine phenom.
